ygData.subject: Re: kill stealing
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You know, this is kind of disturbing.  If level 30+ blue creatures can kick the stuffin out of you almost every time... why do they still con blue?
ygData.messageBody:
At 09:42 PM 06/10/1999 GMT, you wrote:
>You will need to group eventually...I have some 30+ level friends who are
>everything from mages to warriors. They tell me it's near impossible to
>solo even a blue creature anymore....groups will become essential. If you
>have a bad rep later on...tough luck for you. I've said this before:
>Wizards are ALWAYS welcome high level groups. These same buddies of mine
>tell me they sometimes look for at least 2 Wizards for their groups.


You know, this is kind of disturbing. If level 30+ blue creatures can kick
the stuffin' out of you almost every time... why do they still con blue?
Shouldn't they be conned yellow or red?

Are the con colors a straight, level-wise calculation (L15 vs L15 =
white/black),
or a probability of success calculation (L15 vs L15, but the player is low
on HP = yellow)?

Of course, I'll not see level 30+ critters as anything but red for a long
long time. =)

-Pennaggolan, 3rd Circle Wizard of Felwithe
